content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --AGENT
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000111
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --AGENT is present in a dataset other than MS.
Outcome:
  Message: --AGENT is present in a dataset other than MS.
  Output Variables:
    - --AGENT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0564
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: MS Domain only
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --AGENT
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - MS

json.Description: Raise an error when --AGENT is present in a dataset other than MS.

Outcome.Message: --AGENT is present in a dataset other than MS.
